definitions.definition: (ditransitive) To transfer goods or provide services in exchange for money.
definitions.example: I'll sell you all three for a hundred dollars.
The corn sold for a good price.

definitions.definition: To promote a product or service.

definitions.example: My boss is very old-fashioned and I'm having a lot of trouble selling the idea of working at home occasionally.

definitions.definition: To trick, cheat, or manipulate someone.
To pretend that an opponent's blows or maneuvers are causing legitimate injury; to act.
Action of the verb to sell.

definitions.example: You've got to work on your selling.
